caption: This photograph features a prominent road sign reading "COLUMBIA RIVER" mounted on a white pole. The sign is rectangular with a white background and bold, black lettering. The background of the image provides a natural setting, showing the blurred silhouettes of trees and what appears to be a hint of a distant river or water body. The trees have dense foliage and are likely in a lush area, hinting that the location is possibly near the river indicated by the sign. The sky behind the sign and trees appears to be overcast, suggesting a bright yet cloudy day. The composition focuses sharply on the sign, making it the clear subject of the photo, with a blurred natural scene serving as a backdrop.
title: The Columbia River at Cathlamet
